title: adsiix

content: https://captcha.my.id- Unlimited Claim- No Timer- No Pop Up / Under Ads- Instant Payout Every 5x Claim To FaucetPay

comments.author: Mist3rX
comments.body: Interesting site concecpt! It would be even more fun, if other captchas would be implemented besides hCaptcha...its a bit slow and tedious  But all in all, nice idea & site

comments.author: limmurk
comments.body: I doesn't work for me. I can't pass  the first page (get started). My bitcoin adress is copied from faucetpay and the cpatcha is correct. The popup says "change your internet connection". I have no idea what this could mean.
